## 5.2

### 4

```{r}
# Q1 a
set.seed(19)
u <- runif(1000, 0, 1)
y <- u + 2
hist(y, freq = FALSE)
abline(1, 0, col = "purple")
```

```{r}
# Q1 b
set.seed(19)
u <- runif(1000, 0, 1)
y <- u^3
curve(expr = 1 / 3 * x^(-2 / 3), from = 0, to = 1, col = "purple")
hist(y, freq = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# Q2 a
set.seed(19)
u <- runif(1000, 0, 1)
y <- log(u + 1)
curve(expr = exp(x), from = 0, to = log(2), col = "purple")
hist(y, freq = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# Q2 b

u <- runif(1000, 0, 1)
y <- u^3
```
